targets.query: SELECT 100-mean("usage_idle") FROM "cpu" WHERE ("host" =~ /nginx-deployment-/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("used_percent") FROM "mem" WHERE ("host" =~ /nginx-deployment-/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(bytes_recv),1s)/10 FROM "net" WHERE ("host" =~ /nginx-deployment-/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
